title: Limits an insurer's reduction of coverage by limiting the volume of notices of intention to four percent, establishes standards for definitions; repealer
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to limiting the scope of an insurer's reduction of insurance coverage by limiting the volume of notices of intention to not renew or condition renewal to four percent of the total number of covered policies of such insurer's rating territory; and in relation to establishing standards for definitions contained within such law; and repealing certain provisions of the insurance law relating thereto
